## GlobalContexts interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface GlobalContexts 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [addGlobalContexts(contexts)](./node-tracker.globalcontexts.addglobalcontexts.md) | Adds conditional or primitive global contexts |
|  [clearGlobalContexts()](./node-tracker.globalcontexts.clearglobalcontexts.md) | Removes all global contexts |
|  [getApplicableContexts(event)](./node-tracker.globalcontexts.getapplicablecontexts.md) | Returns all applicable global contexts for a specified event |
|  [getConditionalProviders()](./node-tracker.globalcontexts.getconditionalproviders.md) | Returns all Conditional Contexts |
|  [getGlobalPrimitives()](./node-tracker.globalcontexts.getglobalprimitives.md) | Returns all Context Primitives |
|  [removeGlobalContexts(contexts)](./node-tracker.globalcontexts.removeglobalcontexts.md) | Removes previously added global context, performs a deep comparison of the contexts or conditional contexts |
